author: Thomas van de Werff
comment: After a few months of use, the watchface is still not working on my watch. It keeps on force closing immediately after applying it. I am using a nexus 5 and LG g watch. Especially a bummer since I paid money for this app

reply.author: Aidan Grabe
reply.content: Hi Thomas, could you send an email to aidsgrabe@gmail.com with some details about the crash and I'll try get to the bottom of it, or will get you a refund :)

title: Good idea, but force closes

author: Alexander Petrov
comment: Crashes every time I apply the watchface on my Huawei Watch. Please help!

author: Christopher Buongiovanni
comment: Love the design and functionality, but the watchface doesn't automatically update the calendar data, seems to be stuck on the same day/event.

author: Matej Cibic
comment: Try it out and see for yourself...
title: Best calendar watchface!

author: Laura West
comment: Love the concept but it doesn't work.

author: Taylor Gilmore
comment: Allow me to change the color of the Clock hands! That'd be nice!

reply.author: Aidan Grabe
reply.content:
Hi there Taylor,
This feature has been added in the latest update, hope you like it!

title: Great! But 1 request!

author: Petter Alstermark
comment: It's still a bit rough but have potential to become a top watch face for me. Would be nice with more options such as hide numbers, thickness of lines and smoother graphics.
title: Good

author: Karl Grabe
comment: Just the thing, keeps me on top of my appointments.
title: Gr8

author: Szasz Bernard
comment: Hello, looks like a great app but its crashes continuously after selecting it. Sorry I could not use it at all. Fix it and I will buy it again. Thanks.
title: Keep crashing on Huawei W1

author: Scott Pyritz
comment: Really good idea.  Unfortunately font is too small for me.

reply.author: Aidan Grabe
reply.content:
Hi Scott! I will look into adding a setting to change the font size, it's just things will get a bit cluttered the larger the text.
Thanks for trying it and I appreciate the feedback :)
